document.query: CREATE TABLE `so_tracking` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `so_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `tracking_no` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `delivery_date` date, `delivery_partner` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `status` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `created_at` datetime, `updated_at` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
